title: Manappuram Finance board okays Rs 7,800 cr fund raise for FY23 - Business Today
content: Manappuram Finance board okays Rs 7,800 cr fund raise for FY23  Business Today
description: The company's board approved a fund-raising programme for FY 2022-23, which interalia includes issuance of redeemable non-convertible debentures up to the overall limit of Rs 7,800 crore.
